name: 郭政淳
objective:
本課程主要在培養進階寫作能力，採用功能導向的方式，諸如書函，文章／書本摘要，評論，創作，學術專技報告等專項進行演練。
This course, using a functionally-oriented approach, aims at increasing university-level EFL writing students' English writing skills and developing them into more fluent, confident writers. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to compose a wide variety of extended writing pieces, including letters, memos, abstracts, reviews, creative writings, and technical reports.
schedule:
Week 1 Introduction
Week 2 Holiday: No Class
Week 3 Good Writing in the 21st century
Week 4 Correct Writing (I)
Week 5 Correct Writing (II)
Week 6 Telling Story (I): Actions
Week 7 Holiday: No Class
Week 8 Telling Story (II): Characters
Week 9 Academic Writing Workshop (I): Graphs
Week 10 Coherence
Week 11 Writing Clearly (I)
Week 12 Writing Clearly (II)
Week 13 Academic Writing Workshop (II): Abstracts
Week 14 Writing Elegantly (I)
Week 15 Writing Elegantly (II)
Week 16 Academic Writing Workshop (III): Critiques
Week 17 Holiday: No Class
Week 18 Final Exam
